item.title: 911 centers are so understaffed, they’re turning to AI to answer calls
item.description: The company offers an AI voice assistant that helps 911 centers offload non-emergency call volume.

item.title: WhatsApp’s new AI feature lets you rephrase and adjust the tone of your messages
item.description: With Writing Help, users can get AI-generated suggestions that rewrite their messages in professional, funny, supportive, or rephrased way.

item.title: With Starship Flight 10, SpaceX prioritized resilience over perfection
item.description: SpaceX proves it can fly through failures on Starship’s tenth test flight.

item.title: FBI says China’s Salt Typhoon hacked at least 200 US companies
item.description: The FBI's cyber chief says the long-running China-backed hacking campaign is "ongoing" and affecting companies all over the world.

item.title: Google and Grok are catching up to ChatGPT, says a16z’s latest AI report
item.description: The report, in its fifth iteration, showcases two and a half years of data about consumers' evolving use of AI products.
